Auto Logoff

Auto logoff will automatically disconnect a user’s session in Workbench or web if there has been no activity for a period of time. We have built in activity monitoring functionality that will keep the session alive as long as user input is happening. This works out of the box in most cases, but some custom views may need special handling for activity monitoring to work properly. For more information, see the following pages.

  • Auto Logoff - Web
  • Auto Logoff - Workbench
